00355 void set_scaled_I( MsqMatrix<3,3> R[6], double alpha )
00356 {
00357   R[0] = R[3] = R[5] = MsqMatrix<3,3>(alpha);
00358   R[1] = R[2] = R[4] = MsqMatrix<3,3>(0.0);
00359 }
00360 
00361 void pluseq_scaled_I( MsqMatrix<3,3>& R, double alpha )
00362 {
00363   R(0,0) += alpha;
00364   R(1,1) += alpha;
00365   R(2,2) += alpha;
00366 }
00367 
00368 void pluseq_scaled_I( MsqMatrix<2,2>& R, double alpha )
00369 {
00370   R(0,0) += alpha;
00371   R(1,1) += alpha;
00372 }
00373 
00374 void pluseq_scaled_I( MsqMatrix<3,3> R[6], double alpha )
00375 {
00376   pluseq_scaled_I( R[0], alpha );
00377   pluseq_scaled_I( R[3], alpha );
00378   pluseq_scaled_I( R[5], alpha );
00379 }
00380 
00381 void set_scaled_I( MsqMatrix<2,2> R[3], double alpha )
00382 {
00383   R[0] = R[2] = MsqMatrix<2,2>(alpha);
00384   R[1]        = MsqMatrix<2,2>(0.0);
00385 }
00386 
00387 void pluseq_scaled_I( MsqMatrix<2,2> R[3], double alpha )
00388 {
00389   pluseq_scaled_I( R[0], alpha );
00390   pluseq_scaled_I( R[2], alpha );
00391 }
00392 
00393 void pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( MsqMatrix<3,3> R[6],
00394                                      double alpha,
00395                                      const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T )
00396 {
00397   MsqMatrix<3,3> A(T);
00398   A *= alpha;
00399 
00400   R[1](0,1) += A(2,2);
00401   R[1](1,0) -= A(2,2);
00402   R[1](0,2) -= A(2,1);
00403   R[1](2,0) += A(2,1);
00404   R[1](1,2) += A(2,0);
00405   R[1](2,1) -= A(2,0);
00406   
00407   R[2](0,1) -= A(1,2);
00408   R[2](1,0) += A(1,2);
00409   R[2](0,2) += A(1,1);
00410   R[2](2,0) -= A(1,1);
00411   R[2](1,2) -= A(1,0);
00412   R[2](2,1) += A(1,0);
00413  
00414   R[4](0,1) += A(0,2);
00415   R[4](1,0) -= A(0,2);
00416   R[4](0,2) -= A(0,1);
00417   R[4](2,0) += A(0,1);
00418   R[4](1,2) += A(0,0);
00419   R[4](2,1) -= A(0,0);
00420 }
00421 
00422 void set_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( MsqMatrix<3,3> R[6],
00423                                   double alpha,
00424                                   const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T )
00425 {
00426   MsqMatrix<3,3> A(T);
00427   A *= alpha;
00428 
00429   R[0] = R[3] = R[5] = MsqMatrix<3,3>(0.0);
00430 
00431   R[1](0,0) = R[1](1,1) = R[1](2,2) = 0;
00432   R[1](0,1) =  A(2,2);
00433   R[1](1,0) = -A(2,2);
00434   R[1](0,2) = -A(2,1);
00435   R[1](2,0) =  A(2,1);
00436   R[1](1,2) =  A(2,0);
00437   R[1](2,1) = -A(2,0);
00438   
00439   R[2](0,0) = R[2](1,1) = R[2](2,2) = 0;
00440   R[2](0,1) = -A(1,2);
00441   R[2](1,0) =  A(1,2);
00442   R[2](0,2) =  A(1,1);
00443   R[2](2,0) = -A(1,1);
00444   R[2](1,2) = -A(1,0);
00445   R[2](2,1) =  A(1,0);
00446  
00447   R[4](0,0) = R[4](1,1) = R[4](2,2) = 0;
00448   R[4](0,1) =  A(0,2);
00449   R[4](1,0) = -A(0,2);
00450   R[4](0,2) = -A(0,1);
00451   R[4](2,0) =  A(0,1);
00452   R[4](1,2) =  A(0,0);
00453   R[4](2,1) = -A(0,0);
00454 }
00455 
00456 void pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( MsqMatrix<2,2> R[3], double alpha )
00457 {
00458   R[1](0,1) += alpha;
00459   R[1](1,0) -= alpha;
00460 }
00461 
00462 void set_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( MsqMatrix<2,2> R[3], double alpha )
00463 {
00464   R[0] = R[2] = MsqMatrix<2,2>(0.0);
00465   R[1](0,0) =  0.0;
00466   R[1](0,1) =  alpha;
00467   R[1](1,0) = -alpha;
00468   R[1](1,1) =  0.0;
00469   
00470 }
00471 
00472 void pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_tr_adj( MsqMatrix<2,2>*, double  )
00473 {
00474   // 2nd derivative is zero
00475 }
00476 
00477 void pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_tr_adj( MsqMatrix<3,3> R[6], double alpha )
00478 {
00479   R[1](0,1) += alpha;
00480   R[1](1,0) -= alpha;
00481   R[2](0,2) += alpha;
00482   R[2](2,0) -= alpha;
00483   R[4](1,2) += alpha;
00484   R[4](2,1) -= alpha;
00485 }
00486 
00487 void set_scaled_2nd_deriv_norm_sqr_adj( MsqMatrix<2,2> R[3], 
00488                                         double alpha,
00489                                         const MsqMatrix<2,2>&  )
00490 {
00491   set_scaled_I( R, 2*alpha );
00492 }
00493 
00494 void set_scaled_2nd_deriv_norm_sqr_adj( MsqMatrix<3,3> R[6], 
00495                                         double alpha,
00496                                         const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T )
00497 {
00498   set_scaled_outer_product( R, 1, T );
00499   double tmp01, tmp02, tmp12;
00500   //R[1] = 2*R[1] - transpose(R[1]);
00501   tmp01 = R[1](0,1);
00502   tmp02 = R[1](0,2);
00503   tmp12 = R[1](1,2);
00504   R[1](0,1) = 2 * R[1](0,1) - R[1](1,0);
00505   R[1](0,2) = 2 * R[1](0,2) - R[1](2,0);
00506   R[1](1,2) = 2 * R[1](1,2) - R[1](2,1);
00507   R[1](1,0) = 2 * R[1](1,0) - tmp01;
00508   R[1](2,0) = 2 * R[1](2,0) - tmp02;
00509   R[1](2,1) = 2 * R[1](2,1) - tmp12;
00510   //R[2] = 2*R[2] - transpose(R[1]);
00511   tmp01 = R[2](0,1);
00512   tmp02 = R[2](0,2);
00513   tmp12 = R[2](1,2);
00514   R[2](0,1) = 2 * R[2](0,1) - R[2](1,0);
00515   R[2](0,2) = 2 * R[2](0,2) - R[2](2,0);
00516   R[2](1,2) = 2 * R[2](1,2) - R[2](2,1);
00517   R[2](1,0) = 2 * R[2](1,0) - tmp01;
00518   R[2](2,0) = 2 * R[2](2,0) - tmp02;
00519   R[2](2,1) = 2 * R[2](2,1) - tmp12;
00520   //R[4] = 2*R[4] - transpose(R[1]);
00521   tmp01 = R[4](0,1);
00522   tmp02 = R[4](0,2);
00523   tmp12 = R[4](1,2);
00524   R[4](0,1) = 2 * R[4](0,1) - R[4](1,0);
00525   R[4](0,2) = 2 * R[4](0,2) - R[4](2,0);
00526   R[4](1,2) = 2 * R[4](1,2) - R[4](2,1);
00527   R[4](1,0) = 2 * R[4](1,0) - tmp01;
00528   R[4](2,0) = 2 * R[4](2,0) - tmp02;
00529   R[4](2,1) = 2 * R[4](2,1) - tmp12;
00530   
00531   const MsqMatrix<3,3> TpT = transpose(T) * T;
00532   R[0] -= TpT;
00533   R[3] -= TpT;
00534   R[5] -= TpT;
00535   
00536   const MsqMatrix<3,3> TTp = T * transpose(T);
00537   const double ns = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00538   R[0](0,0) += ns - TTp(0,0);
00539   R[0](1,1) += ns - TTp(0,0);
00540   R[0](2,2) += ns - TTp(0,0);
00541   R[1](0,0) +=    - TTp(0,1);
00542   R[1](1,1) +=    - TTp(0,1);
00543   R[1](2,2) +=    - TTp(0,1);
00544   R[2](0,0) +=    - TTp(0,2);
00545   R[2](1,1) +=    - TTp(0,2);
00546   R[2](2,2) +=    - TTp(0,2);
00547   R[3](0,0) += ns - TTp(1,1);
00548   R[3](1,1) += ns - TTp(1,1);
00549   R[3](2,2) += ns - TTp(1,1);
00550   R[4](0,0) +=    - TTp(1,2);
00551   R[4](1,1) +=    - TTp(1,2);
00552   R[4](2,2) +=    - TTp(1,2);
00553   R[5](0,0) += ns - TTp(2,2);
00554   R[5](1,1) += ns - TTp(2,2);
00555   R[5](2,2) += ns - TTp(2,2);
00556   
00557   alpha *= 2;
00558   R[0] *= alpha;
00559   R[1] *= alpha;
00560   R[2] *= alpha;
00561   R[3] *= alpha;
00562   R[4] *= alpha;
00563   R[5] *= alpha;
00564 }
00565 
00566 #ifdef MSQ_ROW_BASED_OUTER_PRODUCT
00567 template <unsigned D>
00568 void pluseq_scaled_outer_product_t( MsqMatrix<D,D> R[D*(D+1)/2],
00569                                   double alpha,
00570                                   const MsqMatrix<D,D>& M )
00571 {
00572   MsqMatrix<D,D> aM(M);
00573   aM *= alpha;
00574   unsigned h = 0;
00575   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; ++i)
00576     for (unsigned j = i; j < D; ++j)
00577       R[h++] += transpose(aM.row(i)) * M.row(j);
00578 }
00579 #else
00580 template <unsigned D>
00581 void pluseq_scaled_outer_product_t( MsqMatrix<D,D> R[D*(D+1)/2],
00582                                   double alpha,
00583                                   const MsqMatrix<D,D>& M )
00584 {
00585   MsqMatrix<D,D> aM(transpose(M));
00586   aM *= alpha;
00587   unsigned h = 0;
00588   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; ++i)
00589     for (unsigned j = i; j < D; ++j)
00590       R[h++] += M.column(i) * aM.row(0);
00591 }
00592 #endif
00593 
00594 #ifdef MSQ_ROW_BASED_OUTER_PRODUCT
00595 template <unsigned D>
00596 void set_scaled_outer_product_t( MsqMatrix<D,D> R[D*(D+1)/2],
00597                                double alpha,
00598                                const MsqMatrix<D,D>& M )
00599 {
00600   MsqMatrix<D,D> aM(M);
00601   aM *= alpha;
00602   unsigned h = 0;
00603   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; ++i)
00604     for (unsigned j = i; j < D; ++j)
00605       R[h++] = transpose(aM.row(i)) * M.row(j);
00606 }
00607 #else
00608 template <unsigned D>
00609 void set_scaled_outer_product_t( MsqMatrix<D,D> R[D*(D+1)/2],
00610                                double alpha,
00611                                const MsqMatrix<D,D>& M )
00612 {
00613   MsqMatrix<D,D> aM(transpose(M));
00614   aM *= alpha;
00615   unsigned h = 0;
00616   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; ++i)
00617     for (unsigned j = i; j < D; ++j)
00618       R[h++] = M.column(i) * aM.row(j);
00619 }
00620 #endif
00621 
00622 
00623 #ifdef MSQ_ROW_BASED_OUTER_PRODUCT
00624 void pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( MsqMatrix<3,3> R[6],
00625                                       double alpha,
00626                                       const MsqMatrix<3,3>& A_in,
00627                                       const MsqMatrix<3,3>& B )
00628 {
00629     // apply scalar first
00630   MsqMatrix<3,3> A(A_in), tmp;
00631   A *= alpha;
00632 
00633     // block 0,0
00634   tmp = transpose(A.row(0)) * B.row(0);
00635   R[0] += tmp;
00636   R[0] += transpose(tmp);
00637   
00638     // block 1,1
00639   tmp = transpose(A.row(1)) * B.row(1);
00640   R[3] += tmp;
00641   R[3] += transpose(tmp);
00642   
00643     // block 2,2
00644   tmp = transpose(A.row(2)) * B.row(2);
00645   R[5] += tmp;
00646   R[5] += transpose(tmp);
00647    
00648     // block 0,1
00649   R[1] += transpose(A.row(0)) * B.row(1) +
00650           transpose(B.row(0)) * A.row(1);
00651   
00652     // block 0,2
00653   R[2] += transpose(A.row(0)) * B.row(2) +
00654           transpose(B.row(0)) * A.row(2);
00655   
00656     // block 1,2
00657   R[4] += transpose(A.row(1)) * B.row(2) +
00658           transpose(B.row(1)) * A.row(2);
00659 }
00660 void set_scaled_sum_outer_product( MsqMatrix<3,3> R[6],
00661                                    double alpha,
00662                                    const MsqMatrix<3,3>& A_in,
00663                                    const MsqMatrix<3,3>& B )
00664 {
00665     // apply scalar first
00666   MsqMatrix<3,3> A(A_in);
00667   A *= alpha;
00668 
00669     // block 0,0
00670   R[0] =  transpose(A.row(0)) * B.row(0);
00671   R[0] += transpose(R[0]);
00672   
00673     // block 1,1
00674   R[3] =  transpose(A.row(1)) * B.row(1);
00675   R[3] += transpose(R[3]);
00676   
00677     // block 2,2
00678   R[5] =  transpose(A.row(2)) * B.row(2);
00679   R[5] += transpose(R[5]);
00680    
00681     // block 0,1
00682   R[1] =  transpose(A.row(0)) * B.row(1);
00683   R[1] += transpose(B.row(0)) * A.row(1);
00684   
00685     // block 0,2
00686   R[2] =  transpose(A.row(0)) * B.row(2);
00687   R[2] += transpose(B.row(0)) * A.row(2);
00688   
00689     // block 1,2
00690   R[4] =  transpose(A.row(1)) * B.row(2);
00691   R[4] += transpose(B.row(1)) * A.row(2);
00692 }
00693 #else
00694 void pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( MsqMatrix<3,3> R[6],
00695                                       double alpha,
00696                                       const MsqMatrix<3,3>& A_in,
00697                                       const MsqMatrix<3,3>& B )
00698 {
00699     // apply scalar first
00700   MsqMatrix<3,3> A(A_in), tmp;
00701   A *= alpha;
00702 
00703     // block 0,0
00704   tmp = A.column(0) * transpose(B.column(0));
00705   R[0] += tmp;
00706   R[0] += transpose(tmp);
00707   
00708     // block 1,1
00709   tmp = A.column(1) * transpose(B.column(1));
00710   R[3] += tmp;
00711   R[3] += transpose(tmp);
00712   
00713     // block 2,2
00714   tmp = A.column(2) * transpose(B.column(2));
00715   R[5] += tmp;
00716   R[5] += transpose(tmp);
00717    
00718     // block 0,1
00719   R[1] += A.column(0) * transpose(B.column(1)) +
00720           B.column(0) * transpose(A.column(1));
00721   
00722     // block 0,2
00723   R[2] += A.column(0) * transpose(B.column(2)) +
00724           B.column(0) * transpose(A.column(2));
00725   
00726     // block 1,2
00727   R[4] += A.column(1) * transpose(B.column(2)) +
00728           B.column(1) * transpose(A.column(2));
00729 }
00730 void set_scaled_sum_outer_product( MsqMatrix<3,3> R[6],
00731                                    double alpha,
00732                                    const MsqMatrix<3,3>& A_in,
00733                                    const MsqMatrix<3,3>& B )
00734 {
00735     // apply scalar first
00736   MsqMatrix<3,3> A(A_in);
00737   A *= alpha;
00738 
00739     // block 0,0
00740   R[0] = A.column(0) * transpose(B.column(0));
00741   R[0] += transpose(R[0]);
00742   
00743     // block 1,1
00744   R[3] = A.column(1) * transpose(B.column(1));
00745   R[3] += transpose(R[3]);
00746   
00747     // block 2,2
00748   R[5] = A.column(2) * transpose(B.column(2));
00749   R[5] += transpose(R[5]);
00750    
00751     // block 0,1
00752   R[1] =  A.column(0) * transpose(B.column(1));
00753   R[1] += B.column(0) * transpose(A.column(1));
00754   
00755     // block 0,2
00756   R[2] =  A.column(0) * transpose(B.column(2));
00757   R[2] += B.column(0) * transpose(A.column(2));
00758   
00759     // block 1,2
00760   R[4] =  A.column(1) * transpose(B.column(2));
00761   R[4] += B.column(1) * transpose(A.column(2));
00762 }
00763 #endif
00764 
00765 #ifdef MSQ_ROW_BASED_OUTER_PRODUCT
00766 void pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( MsqMatrix<2,2> R[3],
00767                                       double alpha,
00768                                       const MsqMatrix<2,2>& A_in,
00769                                       const MsqMatrix<2,2>& B )
00770 {
00771     // apply scalar first
00772   MsqMatrix<2,2> A(A_in), tmp;
00773   A *= alpha;
00774 
00775     // block 0,0
00776   tmp = transpose(A.row(0)) * B.row(0);
00777   R[0] += tmp;
00778   R[0] += transpose(tmp);
00779   
00780     // block 1,1
00781   tmp = transpose(A.row(1)) * B.row(1);
00782   R[2] += tmp;
00783   R[2] += transpose(tmp);
00784    
00785     // block 0,1
00786   R[1] += transpose(A.row(0)) * B.row(1) +
00787           transpose(B.row(0)) * A.row(1);
00788 }
00789 void set_scaled_sum_outer_product( MsqMatrix<2,2> R[3],
00790                                    double alpha,
00791                                    const MsqMatrix<2,2>& A_in,
00792                                    const MsqMatrix<2,2>& B )
00793 {
00794     // apply scalar first
00795   MsqMatrix<2,2> A(A_in);
00796   A *= alpha;
00797 
00798     // block 0,0
00799   R[0] =  transpose(A.row(0)) * B.row(0);
00800   R[0] += transpose(R[0]);
00801   
00802     // block 1,1
00803   R[2] =  transpose(A.row(1)) * B.row(1);
00804   R[2] += transpose(R[2]);
00805    
00806     // block 0,1
00807   R[1] =  transpose(A.row(0)) * B.row(1);
00808   R[1] += transpose(B.row(0)) * A.row(1);
00809 }
00810 #else
00811 void pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( MsqMatrix<2,2> R[3],
00812                                       double alpha,
00813                                       const MsqMatrix<2,2>& A_in,
00814                                       const MsqMatrix<2,2>& B )
00815 {
00816     // apply scalar first
00817   MsqMatrix<2,2> A(A_in), tmp;
00818   A *= alpha;
00819 
00820     // block 0,0
00821   tmp = A.column(0) * transpose(B.column(0));
00822   R[0] += tmp;
00823   R[0] += transpose(tmp);
00824   
00825     // block 1,1
00826   tmp = A.column(1) * transpose(B.column(1));
00827   R[2] += tmp;
00828   R[2] += transpose(tmp);
00829    
00830     // block 0,1
00831   R[1] += A.column(0) * transpose(B.column(1)) +
00832           B.column(0) * transpose(A.column(1));
00833 }
00834 void set_scaled_sum_outer_product( MsqMatrix<2,2> R[3],
00835                                    double alpha,
00836                                    const MsqMatrix<2,2>& A_in,
00837                                    const MsqMatrix<2,2>& B )
00838 {
00839     // apply scalar first
00840   MsqMatrix<2,2> A(A_in);
00841   A *= alpha;
00842 
00843     // block 0,0
00844   R[0] =  A.column(0) * transpose(B.column(0));
00845   R[0] += transpose(R[0]);
00846   
00847     // block 1,1
00848   R[2] =  A.column(1) * transpose(B.column(1));
00849   R[2] += transpose(R[2]);
00850    
00851     // block 0,1
00852   R[1] =  A.column(0) * transpose(B.column(1));
00853   R[1] += B.column(0) * transpose(A.column(1));
00854 }
00855 #endif
00856 
00857 void pluseq_scaled_outer_product_I_I( MsqMatrix<3,3> R[6], double alpha )
00858 {
00859   R[0](0,0) += alpha;
00860   R[1](0,1) += alpha;
00861   R[2](0,2) += alpha;
00862   R[3](1,1) += alpha;
00863   R[4](1,2) += alpha;
00864   R[5](2,2) += alpha;
00865 }
00866 
00867 void pluseq_scaled_outer_product_I_I( MsqMatrix<2,2> R[3], double alpha )
00868 {
00869   R[0](0,0) += alpha;
00870   R[1](0,1) += alpha;
00871   R[2](1,1) += alpha;
00872 }
00873 
00874 #ifdef MSQ_ROW_BASED_OUTER_PRODUCT
00875 inline void pluseq_I_outer_product( MsqMatrix<3,3> R[6], const MsqMatrix<3,3>& A )
00876 {
00877   R[0].add_row( 0, A.row(0) );
00878   R[1].add_row( 0, A.row(1) );
00879   R[2].add_row( 0, A.row(2) );
00880   R[3].add_row( 1, A.row(1) );
00881   R[4].add_row( 1, A.row(2) );
00882   R[5].add_row( 2, A.row(2) );
00883 }
00884 inline void pluseq_I_outer_product( MsqMatrix<2,2> R[3], const MsqMatrix<2,2>& A )
00885 {
00886   R[0].add_row( 0, A.row(0) );
00887   R[1].add_row( 0, A.row(1) );
00888   R[2].add_row( 1, A.row(1) );
00889 }
00890 #else
00891 inline void pluseq_I_outer_product( MsqMatrix<3,3> R[6], const MsqMatrix<3,3>& A )
00892 {
00893   R[0].add_row( 0, transpose(A.column(0)) );
00894   R[1].add_row( 0, transpose(A.column(1)) );
00895   R[2].add_row( 0, transpose(A.column(2)) );
00896   R[3].add_row( 1, transpose(A.column(1)) );
00897   R[4].add_row( 1, transpose(A.column(2)) );
00898   R[5].add_row( 2, transpose(A.column(2)) );
00899 }
00900 inline void pluseq_I_outer_product( MsqMatrix<2,2> R[3], const MsqMatrix<2,2>& A )
00901 {
00902   R[0].add_row( 0, transpose(A.column(0)) );
00903   R[1].add_row( 0, transpose(A.column(1)) );
00904   R[2].add_row( 1, transpose(A.column(1)) );
00905 }
00906 #endif
00907 
00908 #ifdef MSQ_ROW_BASED_OUTER_PRODUCT
00909 inline void pluseq_outer_product_I( MsqMatrix<3,3> R[6], const MsqMatrix<3,3>& A )
00910 {
00911   R[0].add_column( 0, transpose(A.row(0)) );
00912   R[1].add_column( 1, transpose(A.row(0)) );
00913   R[2].add_column( 2, transpose(A.row(0)) );
00914   R[3].add_column( 1, transpose(A.row(1)) );
00915   R[4].add_column( 2, transpose(A.row(1)) );
00916   R[5].add_column( 2, transpose(A.row(2)) );
00917 }
00918 inline void pluseq_outer_product_I( MsqMatrix<2,2> R[3], const MsqMatrix<2,2>& A )
00919 {
00920   R[0].add_column( 0, transpose(A.row(0)) );
00921   R[1].add_column( 1, transpose(A.row(0)) );
00922   R[2].add_column( 1, transpose(A.row(1)) );
00923 }
00924 #else
00925 inline void pluseq_outer_product_I( MsqMatrix<3,3> R[6], const MsqMatrix<3,3>& A )
00926 {
00927   R[0].add_column( 0, A.column(0) );
00928   R[1].add_column( 1, A.column(0) );
00929   R[2].add_column( 2, A.column(0) );
00930   R[3].add_column( 1, A.column(1) );
00931   R[4].add_column( 2, A.column(1) );
00932   R[5].add_column( 2, A.column(2) );
00933 }
00934 inline void pluseq_outer_product_I( MsqMatrix<2,2> R[3], const MsqMatrix<2,2>& A )
00935 {
00936   R[0].add_column( 0, A.column(0) );
00937   R[1].add_column( 1, A.column(0) );
00938   R[2].add_column( 1, A.column(1) );
00939 }
00940 #endif
00941 
00942 template <unsigned D>
00943 void pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product_I_t( MsqMatrix<D,D> R[D*(D+1)/2],
00944                                         double alpha,
00945                                         const MsqMatrix<D,D>& A_in )
00946 {
00947     // apply scalar first
00948   MsqMatrix<D,D> A(A_in);
00949   A *= alpha;
00950   pluseq_I_outer_product( R ,A );
00951   pluseq_outer_product_I( R, A );
00952 }
00953 
00954 template <unsigned D>
00955 void second_deriv_wrt_product_factor_t( MsqMatrix<D,D> R[D*(D+1)/2],
00956                                       const MsqMatrix<D,D>& Z )
00957 {
00958   const MsqMatrix<D,D> Zt = transpose(Z);
00959   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D*(D+1)/2; ++i)
00960     R[i] = (Z * R[i]) * Zt;
00961 }
00962 
00963 void set_scaled_2nd_deriv_wrt_psi( MsqMatrix<2,2> R[3],
00964                                    const double alpha,
00965                                    const double psi,
00966                                    const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T )
00967 {
00968   const double t = trace(T);
00969   const double f = alpha/(psi*psi*psi);
00970   const double s = T(0,1) - T(1,0);
00971   R[0](0,0) = R[1](0,1) = R[2](1,1) =  f*s*s;
00972   R[0](0,1) = R[0](1,0) = R[1](1,1) = -f*s*t;
00973   R[1](0,0) = R[2](0,1) = R[2](1,0) =  f*s*t;
00974   R[0](1,1) = R[2](0,0) = -(R[1](1,0) = -f*t*t);
00975 }
00976 
00977 template <unsigned D> inline
00978 void pluseq_scaled( MsqMatrix<D,D> R[D*(D+1)/2],
00979                     double alpha,
00980                     const MsqMatrix<D,D> Z[D*(D+1)/2] )
00981 {
00982   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D*(D+1)/2; ++i)
00983     R[i] += alpha * Z[i];
00984 }
00985 
00986 
00988 template <unsigned D> inline
00989 void hess_scale_t( MsqMatrix<D,D> R[D*(D+1)/2], double alpha )
00990 {
00991   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D*(D+1)/2; ++i)
00992     R[i] *= alpha;
00993 }
